description: Enhance stale data warning with color thresholds: Gray (normal) < 5 seconds, Yellow (warning) 5-30 seconds, Red (stale) > 30 seconds. Currently only shows stale at 60s. Update ui/header.rs or ui/mod.rs.

title: Multi-Printer Support
description: Monitor multiple Bambu Lab printers simultaneously from a single interface. This is the major v0.3.0 feature that enables aggregate view, tab navigation, and per-printer management.

title: Config: Support array of printers in config.toml
description: Update config.rs to support [[printers]] array format instead of single [printer]. Each printer entry should have: ip, serial, access_code, optional name (friendly name). Maintain backwards compatibility with legacy single-printer format.
close_reason: Merged - config array support (needs main.rs/wizard.rs fix)

title: App State: Manage multiple printer connections
description: Update app.rs to store Vec<SharedPrinterState> instead of single SharedPrinterState. Add active_printer_index for selection. Track connection status per printer. Add methods for get_active_printer(), get_printer(index), get_connected_count().

title: MQTT: Handle multiple MQTT client connections
description: Update mqtt.rs to manage multiple MqttClient instances. Each printer needs its own connection, subscription, and message routing. Handle independent connect/disconnect events per printer.

title: UI: Aggregate view showing all printers in grid
description: Create new aggregate view displaying all printers in a compact grid layout. Each printer card shows: connection status dot, state, HMS status, WiFi signal, last update time, job name, layer info, remaining time. Selected printer has yellow border.

title: Navigation: Tab and number key switching between printers
description: Add keyboard handlers: Tab/Shift+Tab to cycle printers, 1-9 to jump to printer by number, Up/Down arrows in aggregate view, Enter to view selected printer details. Update main.rs event loop.

title: Wizard: Support adding multiple printers in setup
description: Update wizard.rs to allow adding multiple printers during initial setup. After first printer, prompt 'Add another printer? (y/n)'. Also add option to add more printers later from running app.

title: Deterministic Printer Ordering: Consistent order across restarts
description: Ensure printers maintain consistent order across application restarts. Sort by config file order or add explicit sort_order field. Only relevant after multi-printer support is implemented.

title: Performance: Incremental connected count tracking
description: Track connected printer count incrementally instead of iterating all printers each time. Update count in connect/disconnect handlers. Only relevant after multi-printer support.

Connection staleness detection
